definition: To unite two individuals in a legally recognized bond, typically involving a formal ceremony and resulting in a marital relationship. This term is commonly employed when referring to the act of getting married or the process of joining two people in matrimony.

examples.german: Sie haben sich vor kurzem verheiratet.
Meine Eltern sind seit 20 Jahren verheiratet.
examples.english: My parents have been married for 20 years.

examples.german: Er hat sich mit seiner Freundin verheiratet.
Sie plant, sich nächstes Jahr zu verheiraten.
examples.english: She plans to get married next year.
